articles.description: Walmart and other retailers are expected strike a more cautious tone and share more conservative outlooks for the year ahead.
articles.content:
Shoppers walk past a Bloomingdale's store in the SoHo neighborhood of New York, US, on Wednesday, Dec. 28, 2022.
